name: Fort Benedict
description:
Made for Godot Wild Jam #28.

The chickens have taken control of the farm! They no longer have to share their eggs with anyone else. But there are some who desire their eggs, who might try to take them by force. Luckily they are prepared for this.

How to play

The game starts in BUILD mode. While in this mode, you can spend eggs to build fences, using the controls near the top of the screen.
When you are done, click "start wave". You will be unable to build while in WAVE mode. You can see information about the current wave in the left panel. There are a total of 25 waves.

One more thing: you can drag your chickens to any fence you placed at any time! While they are in the coop, they are inactive but will produce eggs for you.
